university.name: Purdue University
university.details: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Junior Frontend Developer
experience.tech: React, TypeScript, React Native, Jest, React Testing Library, Puppeteer, Storybook, Figma, Jira
experience.description: In this role, I developed the company's web application interface using React and TypeScript, incorporating core desktop features like OEMS, Reports, and Services while introducing new enhancements such as Dashboard and Portfolio for an improved online user experience. Furthermore, I extended services to our mobile app with React Native. Additionally, I have a proven track record of enhancing user experiences by employing libraries like Google Analytics and Sentry, effectively tracking issues and user preferences. To uphold product quality, I implemented unit tests with Jest and React Testing Library for both web and mobile applications and conducted end-to-end tests using Puppeteer.

experience.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
experience.tech: Software Testing(CS40800), Systems Programming(CS25200), Computer Architecture(CS25000)
experience.description: In this role, I led four student teams in software development, provided assistance in Software Testing (CS40800), and supported course labs for Systems Programming (CS25200) and Computer Architecture (CS25000).

experience.title: Technical Intern
experience.tech: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, Mocha, C++
experience.description: In this role, I developed and modified clients' web applications using MERN stacks, wrote test cases with Mocha, and addressed defects. I also refactored and maintained C++ code collaboratively. Additionally, I provided technical support for data restoration from Ransomware attacks and contributed to enhancing the security program.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: In this role, I developed new features for our data automation program in Python, implemented Java unit tests for management applications, and optimized MySQL database performance for efficient data handling.

DatApex.name: DatApex
DatApex.details: DatApex is a web application tailored for users seeking efficient preprocessing solutions for their datasets and seamless execution of various machine learning algorithms. The platform empowers users to upload their datasets and apply a diverse range of preprocessing algorithms to enhance data quality and structure. With DatApex, users can effortlessly run different machine learning algorithms on their modified datasets, allowing for comprehensive analysis and model training. The interface offers clear and intuitive navigation, ensuring a user-friendly experience throughout. Additionally, DatApex presents accuracy plots and visualizations in a clean and accessible UI, facilitating insightful data interpretation and decision-making.

MovieNext.name: MovieNext
MovieNext.details: The MovieNext is a Next.js-based project designed to provide users with an intuitive platform to browse a curated list of movies, offering comprehensive details such as titles, descriptions, release years, and more. Leveraging React and Next.js, the application ensures seamless navigation and responsive design across various devices, allowing users to effortlessly explore movie information, including credits, similar movies, and available providers.

Foodie.name: Foodie
Foodie.details: Foodie is a dynamic application designed to streamline dining experiences by recommending personalized dining establishments based on users' preferences. With its intuitive interface, users can effortlessly explore and discover new dining options tailored to their tastes and dietary preferences. Additionally, Foodie simplifies the process of connecting users with restaurants through QR code technology, offering convenience and efficiency in accessing menus, reservations, and other restaurant services.

WebGame.name: WebGame
WebGame.details: Webgame is the ultimate destination for game enthusiasts, offering a diverse selection of engaging games within a single application. With our app, users can immerse themselves in a variety of captivating gaming experiences, all conveniently accessible from one centralized platform.

Tippy.name: Tippy
Tippy.details: Tippy is a convenient and user-friendly tip calculator application tailored for iOS devices. With its intuitive interface and straightforward functionality, Tippy simplifies the process of calculating tips and splitting bills among friends or colleagues. Users can input the total amount of their bill, select their desired tip percentage, and instantly see the calculated tip amount and total bill including tip.

Flix.name: Flix
Flix.details: Flix is a Swift application designed to empower users to browse a vast collection of movies sourced from The Movie Database (TMDb) API. This intuitive app provides users with a seamless platform to explore an extensive library of films, encompassing various genres, ratings, and release dates.

Twitter.name: Twitter
Twitter.details: Twitter is a straightforward iOS application that replicates the core functionality of Twitter, allowing users to read their tweets within a familiar interface. With a minimalist design and intuitive navigation, this app provides users with a seamless experience to stay connected with their Twitter feed. Users can effortlessly scroll through their timelines, view tweets from accounts they follow, and engage with content through likes and retweets. Built with simplicity in mind, Twitter offers a streamlined platform for users to consume and interact with tweets, keeping them informed and engaged with the latest updates from their network.

Parstagram.name: Parstagram
Parstagram.details: Parstagram is a dynamic Instagram clone featuring a custom Parse backend, tailored to offer users a seamless experience in photo sharing and exploration. With Parstagram, users can effortlessly upload and share their favourite photos, as well as explore a global feed curated with captivating images from across the platform. This innovative application not only replicates the core functionalities of Instagram but also introduces a custom Parse backend, enhancing scalability, customization, and performance. Whether users are posting cherished memories or discovering inspiring content, Parstagram provides a vibrant platform for fostering creativity, connection, and community through the art of visual storytelling.

ToonFlix.name: ToonFlix
ToonFlix.details: ToonFlix is an innovative Flutter application designed to provide users with seamless access to Naver's extensive collection of captivating webtoons. Offering a user-friendly interface and smooth navigation, the app enables users to immerse themselves in Naver's diverse range of webtoon content effortlessly. With ToonFlix, users can explore and discover their favourite webtoons, access the latest updates, and enjoy an immersive reading experience right at their fingertips.

Portfolio.name: Joon's Portfolio
Portfolio.details: Joon's Portfolio Website is a concise yet comprehensive online platform designed to showcase Joon's professional profile, skills, work experience, and contact information. With a clean and intuitive design, the website features sections providing an overview of Joon's background and interests, a Skills Showcase highlighting key competencies, and a detailed Work Experience section outlining past roles and achievements. Additionally, the site includes contact information for easy communication.
